mapper.insert:

insert into underwriting_comment( underwriting_comment_guid, annual_field_detail_id, underwriting_comment_type_code, underwriting_comment, grower_contract_year_id, declared_yield_contract_guid, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date) values ( #{underwritingCommentGuid}, #{dto.annualFieldDetailId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.underwritingCommentTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.underwritingComment, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.growerContractYearId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.declaredYieldContractGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now(), #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now() )
mapper.update: update underwriting_comment set underwriting_comment_type_code = #{dto.underwritingCommentTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, underwriting_comment = #{dto.underwritingComment, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where underwriting_comment_guid = #{dto.underwritingCommentGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}
mapper.delete: delete from underwriting_comment where annual_field_detail_id in (select afd.annual_field_detail_id from annual_field_detail afd where afd.field_id = #{fieldId})
mapper.select: from underwriting_comment uc join underwriting_comment_type_code uctc on uctc.underwriting_comment_type_code = uc.underwriting_comment_type_code where uc.annual_field_detail_id = #{annualFieldDetailId} order by uc.create_date desc, uc.underwriting_comment_guid

from underwriting_comment uc join underwriting_comment_type_code uctc on uctc.underwriting_comment_type_code = uc.underwriting_comment_type_code where uc.declared_yield_contract_guid = #{declaredYieldContractGuid} and uc.underwriting_comment_type_code = 'DOP' order by uc.create_date desc, uc.underwriting_comment_guid

from underwriting_comment uc join underwriting_comment_type_code uctc on uctc.underwriting_comment_type_code = uc.underwriting_comment_type_code join annual_field_detail afd on afd.annual_field_detail_id = uc.annual_field_detail_id where afd.field_id = #{fieldId} order by afd.crop_year desc, uc.create_date desc, uc.underwriting_comment_guid
